title: Woman slain in Flint quadruple shooting identified as 20-year-old Darnisha Oaks
content:
FLINT, MI -- Police say the woman who was shot to death last weekend in a quadruple shooting was 20-year-old Darnisha Oaks.
Oaks died Sunday after she was one of four people who were shot around 2:15 p.m. Saturday in the 1100 block of West Paterson, near Proctor Avenue. Another person was last listed in critical condition and two others were last listed in serious condition. Updated conditions were not made available.
Police said there was some type of altercation in the street.
A person of interest, Antonio King Green, turned himself into police but has not yet been charged.
According to her obituary, funeral services for Oaks will take place Tuesday, June 4, at Lawrence E. Moon Funeral Home in Flint.
